DOC.criteria: Healthy subject determine clinically significant deviation normal medical history , physical examination , ECGs , clinical laboratory determination Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) men must use acceptable method contraception avoid pregnancy Current recent ( within 3 month study drug administration ) gastrointestinal disease Current history neurological disease psychiatric disorder cardiovascular disease
